reviewText: The original full length film shot in 1947 was an "official" Southern Pacific promotional film by a noted director. This is a 1950-52 're-edit, that cuts out all the beautiful "steam locomotive" shots and half of the narrator's story. BUT, it is still a good DVD of the 1950 railroads.
This is NOT made 1940. This was made around 1947. Even the dvd states this was AFTER WWII.I wish I could get the correct one. I already have 1947 version and the 1952 version.
